original_title: The World's Biggest Druglord – Tse Chi Lop
overview: Not all drug barons are South American. One who managed to stay largely out of the limelight while he built a global empire was southern Chinese-born Tse Chi Lop who was arrested in Amsterdam earlier this year after building a $60 billion empire.
title: The World's Biggest Druglord – Tse Chi Lop
